@ka8725 True, I really agree with that. For me, the part where `current_page?(action: 'checkout')` works and `current_page?(controller: 'shop')` doesn't, really seems like a bug, and I wanted to fix that.
If u guys think its ok, I'll just leave it, but If you guys think it's a little bit weird too, I'll looks inside the `url_for` method deeper.
Since the `url_for` method returns a perfect url when I'm only passing the action, I think it's able to make it return a perfect url when I'm only passing the controller as well.
I really think it should "even work with only action, controller params" or "needs to be passed both action and controller param".
